title: Deepening Language Domain Understanding Through Virtual Museum Interactive Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic grasp of linguistic concepts and experience with digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Students explore and interact with language-related artifacts through a virtual museum platform, with cognitive load levels analyzed using eye-tracking data during learning. Optimal learning patterns are derived through three-tiered (high/medium/low) interaction experiments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the visual-conceptual linkage structure of linguistic artifacts in a virtual museum environment with over 80% accuracy.
The learning transfer effect can be analyzed with 75% accuracy by comparing interaction levels (high/low).
The correlation between eye-tracking metrics (fixation duration, revisit count) and learning achievement can be presented in the project report.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
